item.title: Airflow console logs display in kuberntes container executor
item.description: Problem description When use kubernetes executor in airflow, the dags not use the podOperator but that use PythonOperator, the console logs end of Running %s on host %s <TaskInstance:, then the task logs don’t redirect to stdout According to the Airflow descript need config the logging class: custom_log_settings Change the custom log settings comment relative code and enable to console the tee_file_task_handler.py edit the following code snippet. comment the following content.
